mapper.insert: insert into place_tbl(place_code, place_name, place_content, place_address, place_lat, place_lng, place_type, place_on) values (#{place_code}, #{place_name}, #{place_content}, #{place_address}, #{place_lat}, #{place_lng}, #{place_type}, #{place_on})
insert into pimg_tbl (place_code, img_code, place_img, file_name) values (#{place_code}, #{img_code}, #{place_img}, #{file_name})
mapper.select: select * from place_tbl order by place_code desc limit #{startRecord}, #{recordPage}
select a.user_id user_id, b.user_profile user_profile from place_tbl a, user_info b where a.user_id = b.user_id and a.place_code = #{no}

select a.place_code AS place_code, a.place_name AS place_name, a.place_content AS place_content, a.place_address AS place_address, a.place_lat AS place_lat, a.place_lng AS place_lng, a.place_type AS place_type, b.place_img AS place_img from place_tbl a, pimg_tbl b where a.place_code = b.place_code and a.place_address like #{local} and b.img_code = 0

select a.place_code AS place_code, a.place_name AS place_name, a.place_content AS place_content, a.place_address AS place_address, a.place_lat AS place_lat, a.place_lng AS place_lng, a.place_type AS place_type, a.add_date AS add_date, a.user_id AS user_id, a.view AS view, b.place_img AS place_img from place_tbl a, pimg_tbl b where a.place_code = b.place_code and b.img_code = 0 and place_on = 1
order by add_date desc limit #{startRecord}, #{recordPage}
